author: mrmitch
title: Eeyore was needed in our LEGO town
review: Have small collection of various Pooh figures, I got as many different ones as I could find for my two year old boy at the time. They haven't been out for years but nice to know they are part of our ever growing LEGO collection. Great for small kids 2-4 years old, easy to build simple and they won't be hurt by small parts.
